channel.title: ::commands
channel.description: [b]sorry ive posted so many things but when i finish one thing i wanna find another lol, ok i was wondering you know how you have to type ::yell or w\e is there a way i can make it like runescape clan chat and just type / hi! instead of ::/ hi! so its easier and more understandable? if so tell how please.[/b]

item.title: ::commands
item.dc:creator: @Busta_Blader Busta Blader
item.description:
@Busta_Blader wrote:

i dont know but the clan chat system is a whole different thing unless u want to make a clan chat system which would be like a friends list and the private chat would just be / infront of the messageâ€¦

your better off using freinds list or ::yell command

Read full topic
